entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 a.m. CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 4:00 AM EST Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: NE 68 km/h gust 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow late this morning. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
